description: Expansion of Local Agenda 21 Implementation in Romania

subproject.description:
The main objective of the project is to build and strengthen the capacity of the local government to implement LA21 based on the experience gained and the results obtained in 9 localities in the pilot phase of this project (2000-2003).

It also aims to assist in the implementation of some of the priority projects proposed by the communities in the framework of the project.

The process is designed to strengthen the effectiveness and efficiency of decentralization and Public Administration Reform in Romania for participatory governance, poverty alleviation, sustained economic growth and sustainable development.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: LA21 Expansion in Romania

title: Expanded implementation of Local Agenda 21 	in Romania
